BNC User Reference Guide

<wtext>

wtext contains a single written text.
Declaration 
element wtext
{
   attribute type
   {
      "ACPROSE" | "FICTION" | "NEWS" | "NONAC" | "OTHERPUB" | "UNPUB"
   },
   ( ( model.divPart | model.global )*, ( div, ( div | model.global )* )? )
}
Attributes
(In addition to global attributes)
type specifies the type of written text.
Status: Required
Legal values are:
ACPROSE Academic prose.
FICTION Fiction and verse.
NEWS Newspapers.
NONAC Non-academic prose and biography.
OTHERPUB Other published materials.
UNPUB Unpublished materials.
Module textstructure
